Package com.fssa.freshnest.dao

Class UserDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.freshnest.dao.UserDAO
public class UserDAO extends Object
This class provides data access methods to interact with the user database table.
Author:
SusikumarPitchaimuth

  • Method Details

    • checkUserLogin

      public boolean checkUserLogin (String email, String password) throws DAOException
      Checks if a user's login credentials are valid.
      Parameters:
      email - The user's email.
      password - The user's password.
      Returns:
      True if the login credentials are valid, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • createUser

      public boolean createUser (User user) throws DAOException
      Creates a new user record in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing user information.
      Returns:
      True if the user is successfully created, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • secondPageUserUpdate

      public boolean secondPageUserUpdate (User user) throws DAOException
      Updates the gender and date of birth information of a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing updated user information.
      Returns:
      True if the user information is successfully updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • updateUser

      public boolean updateUser (User user, User email) throws DAOException
      Updates the user's information in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing updated user information.
      email - The email of the user whose information is to be updated.
      Returns:
      True if the user information is successfully updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • updateProfileImage

      public boolean updateProfileImage (User user) throws DAOException
      Updates the user's profile image in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing the updated profile image information.
      Returns:
      True if the profile image is successfully updated, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.

    • deleteUser

      public boolean deleteUser (User user) throws DAOException
      Marks a user as deleted in the database.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object containing user information to be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the user is successfully marked as deleted, otherwise false.
      Throws:
      DAOException - If there is an issue with the database operation.
